div.p: Got questions? We've got answers. Here's everything you need to know.

div.div: How much commission can I earn?
Commission varies by product: RMC ₹50-₹150/m³, AAC 3-5%, Equipment 5-8%, Materials 2-4%. Experienced agents unlock 15-25% bonuses. Top performers make ₹3-5L/month with repeat bonuses.

Commissions are paid within 7 days of successful delivery and client payment via bank transfer. Track everything in real-time via the agent dashboard. We've maintained 100% on-time payments since 2020.
Zero hidden deductions. Only statutory TDS is applied with monthly statements. No mandatory targets for the first 3 months—then a simple expectation of at least one sale per month to stay active.
I have no sales experience. Can I still apply?

Absolutely! 40% of our agents joined as freshers. A 3-week onboarding covers product knowledge, sales playbooks, client hunting, objection handling, and tool mastery. Expect mentorship and lead support.
What support do I get after training?
You receive 24/7 WhatsApp support, dedicated mentor for 90 days, technical assistance, marketing collateral, initial leads (for freshers), and direct CEO escalation for priority deals.
You'll receive access to our RMC Calculator, agent CRM & mobile app, digital catalogues, delivery tracking, and QR-based certification sharing. Tech-enabled selling gives you a competitive edge.
Do I get an exclusive territory?
Experienced agents can lock exclusive zones after two months of consistent performance. Freshers begin in shared territories and can earn exclusivity after six months of results.
Can I work from my current city?
Yes, we operate across North & West India including Delhi NCR, Haryana, Punjab, Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, and Maharashtra. Nearby cities welcomed—expansion in progress.
Freshers can start part-time (4-5 hours/day). Experienced agents are encouraged full-time, but we support transitional part-time for the first month while you shift from other roles.
How do I apply and what’s the process?
1) Submit the quick form. 2) Receive a phone screening within 24 hours. 3) If selected, onboard in 48 hours with full tool access. Many agents close their first deal within 3-4 weeks.
Zero investment. Zero security deposit. We provide training, marketing, tools, and leads free of cost. You earn purely on commission with full transparency.
Is this a job or partnership?
It's an independent partnership. You're your own boss—no fixed timings, unlimited earning potential, and the freedom to scale by building a sub-agent team.
